entry.title: Tomato-ShadowSocks(armv7+mipsel)
entry.content:
Configuration Overview

Platform
mipsel
armv7
SystemTomato shibby v1.28.0000 MIPSR2-132)Tomato shibby v1.28.0000 K26ARM-132
Support
all
all
Dependentware_mipsel-install_arm.shntware_arm-install_arm.sh

Open JFFS or mount U disk

JFFS

Administration >> JFFS >> Format/Erase >> save

U disk
note:If you do not support JFFS you can choose to mount U disk installed

Enter fdisk -l /dev/sda to see U disk drive which mounts:

root@unknown:/#
Disk /dev/sda: 15.9 GB, 15931539456 bytes
255 heads, 63 sectors/track, 1936 cylinders
Units = cylinders of 16065 * 512 = 8225280 bytes

Device Boot Start End Blocks Id System
/dev/sda1 1 1937 15558112+ c Win95 FAT32 (LBA)

I tagged by the above information indicates that the U disk drive is mounted /dev/sda1

Enter umount -l /dev/sda1 unloading U disk mounted partition , so you can easily format

Enter mkfs.ext3 /dev/sda1 to format the partition as ext3/4 file system format

Modify shadowsocks script installation path

note: After downloading unzip into shadowsocks.zip router /tmp directory

Looking script this command:PREFIX=/jffs

  1. If it is mounted JFFS, you should keep the default
  2. If it is mounted U disk, You should change the PREFIX=/mnt/sda1

Installation script shadowsocks

Download:shadowsocks-libev_2.4.3-1-RC、chinadns_1.3.2、pdnsd_1.2.9a、pcap-dnsproxy0.4.5.0-1、resolvip_0.1、diffutils3.3-3upload to the router /tmp directory

Enter chmod +x /tmp/shadowsocks given execute permissions
Installation /tmp/shadowsocks set_up

Configuration shadowsocks Account

note:Local Server Port and Sever Port Do not backwards

Select agent program

Option
mipsel+armv7
1
ss-redir+gfwlist+pdnsd
2
ss-redir+chnroutes+chinadns+pdnsd
3
ss-redir+chnroutes+pcap_dnsproxy
4
ss-tunnel+chnroutes+chinadns

I’m currently using Option 3 , Option 3 is recommended
note:

  1. If the configuration is successful you can use directly shadowsocks Agent
  2. If you use Option 3 appears unable to use shadowsocks agents may be Pcap_DNSProxy process dies , so you should enter /opt/etc/init.d/S27pcap_dnsprox start

Reboot Router

FQ

Configuration Pcap_DNSProxyDNS resolve

note:Edit Pcap_DNSProxy of Config.conf file ( The file path : /opt/etc/pcap_dnsproxy)

[Local DNS]
Local Protocol = IPv4 + UDP
Local Hosts = 0
Local Main = 0
Local Routing = 0
*/ To use the domain name within the DNS server to resolve the territory to accelerate the speed of access to CDN capabilities , please choose one of the programs , restart services after the completion of the configuration:/*
*/ Local Main = 1 At the same time Local Routing = 1 Open the territory address routing table recognition/*
*/ Local Hosts = 1 Open territory domain whitelist feature/*

[Addresses]
IPv4 Listen Address = 
IPv4 EDNS Client Subnet Address =
IPv4 DNS Address = 202.12.27.33:53 #Foreign DNS, I am here to fill local VPS 's DNS, if you do not know directly 8.8.8.8:53
IPv4 Alternate DNS Address = 8.8.4.4:53|208.67.220.220:443|208.67.222.222:5353 #Alternate DNS, keep the default
IPv4 Local DNS Address = 114.114.114.114:53 #Domestic DNS. Try to fill your own ISP's DNS
IPv4 Local Alternate DNS Address = 114.114.115.115:53:53 #Alternate DNS

Information Reference

https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-libev#usage
https://github.com/shadowsocks/openwrt-shadowsocks/blob/master/files/shadowsocks.rule
https://github.com/chengr28/Pcap_DNSProxy

Usage wiki

Download

shadowsocks script
mipsel packages password:i3q0
armv7 packages password:pldi
entry.summary:
Configuration Overview

Platform
mipsel
armv7
SystemTomato shibby v1.28.0000 MIPSR2-132)Tomato shibby v1.28.0000 K26ARM-132
Support
all
all
Dependentware_mipsel-install_arm.shntware_arm-install_arm.sh
